name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Engineer with 10+ years of experience in AI/ML development and backend system design. Proficient in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Ruby on Rails**, and **Rust**, with a strong focus on building scalable APIs and high-performance applications. Demonstrated expertise in **database management**, **observability**, and **performance optimization**, aligned with cloud-native architectures utilizing **AWS** and **Azure**. Recognized for exceptional coding skills, code review practices, and ability to suggest innovative code solutions. Strong technical leadership capabilities combined with effective mentorship and collaboration in team environments, successfully contributing to projects at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
